text: David Lindsay (born 29 June 1922) was a Scottish professional footballer who played as a full-back for Sunderland. ==References== Category:1922 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Cambuslang Category:Scottish footballers Category:Association football fullbacks Category:Blantyre Victoria F.C. players Category:Sunderland A.F.C. players Category:Southend United F.C. players Category:Yeovil Town F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: David Lindsay (footballer, born 1922)
